body:
I am going to be doing a 'Nebula Top 5 Plays' series and I need some entries

Instructions:
- Play Nebula on Avicus
- Record Yourself
- Get a SICK clip of you getting tons of kills in a row, destroying every monument in a row, etc.
- Send it to > TynvaleTop5@gmail.com
- See if you made the Top 5

How this helps you and the Avicus Community:
- You get a free shout-out
- We build a better community by sharing our skills
- Creates another objective to go for when playing Nebula
- FUN!

I would also really appreciate it if Avicus could help me out and give the 'Top Play' from every episode a rank for a month. It isn't needed though!

If you ever want to check if you made the 'Top 5' here is my Youtube Channel link: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIFyJB3DkZR-04bqr2vf3tA
